about_the_game:
Embark on a journey to the near future!

Even with Hatsune Miku as your companion in some songs!

Enjoy 1 hour of high-definition music featuring meaningful, long, and elaborate compositions and more than 120 images!


  • Play free the start of the game

Tuned with an AKG k712 pro, by the developer himself.

Purchasing this soundtrack supports the game’s development. Thank you so much!



Most of the tracks were created by me, Joseph Sanz, the developer of the video game. I aimed for an exact representation of my vision while crafting scenes and battles in the game. Tracks made by other authors are also duly credited.

The Official Soundtrack for ‘Artificial Life 2061’ captures the essence of living in the future and the ongoing evolution of technology. However, as the game centers on machines acquiring consciousness, there is a distinctive use of acoustic instruments in most tracks, which impart a warm feeling within the predominantly electronic music.



If more songs are added to the game in its final development phase and the licenses align, they will be included in this collection. Rest assured, any new versions or songs created for this game will find their way into this soundtrack.

Nana de Futaba’ is an adaptation of the Japanese Vocaloid song ‘Futaba no Komori Uta,’ beautifully performed here by the talented young opera singer, Mafi Michel!



  • Play free the start of the game
